artworks.title: Silence, Rendered in Gold
artworks.description: A character study without spectacle — expression reduced to essentials. The gesture is minimal, the presence unmistakable.

artworks.title: Catalogue of Distant Rooms
artworks.description: A room that prioritizes breathing space. Light behaves like a soft rule: it reveals only what is necessary, and nothing more.

artworks.title: The Hour Between Names
artworks.description: A disciplined study of restraint — light withheld until it becomes language. The surface is calm, but the structure carries weight, like a page that remembers being touched.

artworks.title: Dust Jacket for a Storm
artworks.description: Built like an archival document: measured, quiet, deliberate. The composition invites slow reading, rewarding attention with subtle shifts in temperature and depth.
